tha-ap373:0.3_0: he was imprucated by the senior monks.
tha-ap373:1.3_0: Arranging my robe over one shoulder
tha-ap373:2.1_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
tha-ap373:3.1_0: Though the world of the world,
tha-ap373:3.3_0: Awakened as a fully awakened Buddha,
tha-ap373:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap373:4.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
tha-ap373:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap373:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap373:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap373:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
tha-ap373:7.1_0: For the senior monk Bodhi is first.
